name: Breed 96
overview: In the year 2032 the earth was terraformed to restore it's crumbling atmosphere. However evil factions sabotaged the terraformation resulting in the deaths of 29 billion people. The federation government sent a deep space colonisation ship to a remote galaxy in the Daarion cluster with a mission to colonise a planet in that sector. The Daarion cluster was chosen because it is home to three alien races which had become dependant on Federation technology and advice. Unforeseen by the federation, civil unrest in the alien communities became apparent resulting in the colonisation ship being fired upon. The crew inside the ship, under cryogenic suspension, were helpless against the attack and the severely damaged vessel crashed into a desolate planet nearby. The federation leaders having escaped to a neighbouring planet have pledged support and you as caretaker of the colonisation mission are responsible to ensure that the Federation prospers in the fierce struggle to become the new ..... BREED.
